pages.text: $(li)Water Bottles contains water in their interior.$(br)$(li)They can be used to brew an $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/awkward)Awkward Potion$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/weakness)Potion of Weakness$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/inspirations/barometer)Barometer$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
